Audio.Locality: Km12, Piste de la Crique Dardanelles, Mana
Audio.Author: Jon King
Audio.Comments: Distance to mic. 8m. Typical calls at ‘lek’ of 4-6 birds (all appeared to be males) given from ground. All individuals sat 1-5m apart. Full moonlight two days prior to full moon. Birds in track next to very small quarry (where we were camped!) in old growth lowland forest with history of selective logging.bird-seen:yesplayback-used:no
